title: How do I configure email settings?
answer:
Adding an email account 

 Go to Email and touch Others. An email account can be configured automatically or manually. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112797) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112798) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112799)

 To manually set up an email account: 

 1. On the account setting screen, enter your email account and password. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112800)

 2. Touch Manual setup to display the following screen. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112801)

 3. Touch POP3 to display the following screen. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112802)

 4. Configure the POP3 settings and touch Next. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112803)

 5. Configure the email receiving settings and touch Next. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112804)

 6. Set Inbox checking frequency and touch Next. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112805)

 7. Set the account name and your name and touch Next. You will then access the inbox of the email account. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112806)

 You can automatically set up your email account for certain email service providers only when the email settings have been preconfigured on your phone. To automatically set up an email account: 

 1. On the account setting screen, enter your email account and password. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112807)

 2. Touch Next. After your phone verifies incoming server settings, set Inbox checking frequency. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112808) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112809)

 3. Touch Next. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112810)

 4. Set the account name and your name and touch Next. You will then access the inbox of the email account. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112811)

 For details about email account settings, contact your email service provider. 

 Sending an email 

 On the Inbox screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112812), enter the recipient, subject, email content, and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112813). 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112814)

 Viewing and deleting an email 

 On the Inbox screen, touch an email to read it, and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112815) to delete it. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112816)

 Removing an email account 

 On the Inbox screen, touch the menu key. From the displayed option menu, choose Settings. Touch the email account you want to remove. From the displayed screen, touch Remove account. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112817) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112818)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112819)
